DOM.p: Your experience as a customer is our top priority. To achieve this goal, we provide you with a variety of services. Here is a selection:

ul.li: Installation: to ensure devices are set up and configured properly.
Training: to show you how to use and get the most out of the smart devices.
Support: We provide you with a support hotline and online help so that you can get help with any problems or questions.
Repair: If one of the devices is broken, you could request repair services to ensure the devices are working properly again.
Upgrades: We also offer upgrades to keep your smart devices up to date and providing the best possible performance.
